+
rBuilder Online is a free public service provided by rPath, with the stipulation that any development work done using rBuilder Online becomes public as well. rBuilder Online allows the creation of software appliances, virtual appliances and derivative Linux distributions based on [[Conary (package manager)|Conary]]. rBuilder can create installable images, hard drive images and [[Live CD]] bootable images. It creates virtual images in the following formats:
* [[VMware]] virtual disk (*.vmdk, *.dsk)
* [[VMware]] virtual disk (*.vmdk, *.dsk)
* [[Microsoft Virtual PC]] ([[VHD]])
* [[Microsoft Virtual PC]] ([[VHD]])
